theme.title: Enable Bloomreach Search on a Theme
theme.description: Click on a theme to open theme editor and configure Bloomreach Search App embeds to replace the built in Shopify search results page.

searchTemplate.title: Template
searchTemplate.description: Configure the template for displaying your search results powered by Bloomreach API's.

searchListTemplate.title: Product List Template
searchListTemplate.description: Configure the template for displaying the product grid within your search results powered by Bloomreach API's.
